Package io.codecastle.scriptorium.json

Fluent API and factories for as-you-go output of JSON documents and document fragments, and for inscribing JSON in other contexts.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JsonAppendable<THIS extends JsonAppendable<THIS>>
    Represents a JSON string or key currently being output.
    JsonArray<THIS extends JsonArray<THIS>>
    Represents a JSON array currently being output.
    JsonObject<THIS extends JsonObject<THIS>>
    Represents a JSON object currently being output.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Json
    Factory methods for creating new JSON documents and JSON document fragments.
    JsonArrayDocument
    Represents a JSON array currently being output as a JSON document fragment.
    JsonArrayNode<P>
    Represents a JSON array currently being output within a parent context, typically a containing JsonArray or JsonObject.
    JsonInscription
    Inscription functions for JSON documents and JSON document fragments.
    JsonKey<P>
    Represents a JSON key currently being output within a containing JsonObject.
    JsonObjectDocument
    Represents a JSON object currently being output as a JSON document.
    JsonObjectNode<P>
    Represents a JSON object currently being output within a parent context, typically a containing JsonArray or JsonObject.
    JsonValue<P>
    Represents a JSON string literal currently being output within a containing JsonArray or JsonObject.

Package io.codecastle.scriptorium.json Description

Fluent API and factories for as-you-go output of JSON documents and document fragments, and for inscribing JSON in other contexts.

All actual output is handled by members of io.codecastle.scriptorium.json.scribe.

See Also:
Json, JsonInscription
